domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @JoeBiden The initial projections for COVID-19 fatalities was 1 million people. To date, we’ve lost 23,000 Americans to this horrible disease. If you aren’t going to get your hands dirty and DO something instead of just talk, at least show some integrity and be accurate when you complain.
